data.title: What's new on the site
data.text:
What's new on the site - 2008

Help needed part II

Im looking for side view photos/images on Fiat CR.42s, especially from Belgium and Germany but also from Italy and Sweden.

They are to be used as background/basis for artists profiles for a new book project from a major publisher.

If anyone thinks that they can help me, please fell free to contact me! (surfcity@dalnet.se)

19/12-2008

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

Thanks for all kind help during the past year!

Im off for three weeks of winter holiday. Updates and email replies will be slow during this period.
